channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD

item.title: Report X-2024070872
item.description:
Report X-2024070872

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-15T18:15:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-05
  • City: LAUREL
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TO SILVER BELT FOR LEAKING HAZMAT. RESPONDED WITH FULL PPE, DRCISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEET. PACKAGE HAD A CORROSIVE LABEL AND THERE WAS NO VISIBLE LEAKAGE ON THE PACKAGE. UPON INSPECTION OF PACKAGE RESPONDER DISCOVERED A SOILED SPOT ON THE BOTTOM OF THE PACKAGE. REMOVED TO DMP IN SPILL TUB FOR FURTHER EXAM.

item.description:
Report X-2024070511

  • City: WHITE MARSH
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The plastic Jerrican, had been bumped on the top when a Package Handler was lifting it onto a belt. The bump caused a very small dent and puncture in the top corner. A very small amount of the contents were bubbling from that spot.
